channel.title: Problems With 508 Client not connecting to Update Server
channel.description:
Okay, Well I've had a few issues whilst trying to setup a 508, to make it public. The first problem i had was i couldn't connect to my host no-ip, on my client. It had previously only connected to the local host of (192.168.1.2(or)127.0.0.1(or)0.0.0.0). Now i have finally fixed that, so it now connects through the host i had specified on my no-ip account. Then i uploaded the client for a friend to try, so i could see if my ports were open. He received; Java not recognized Error. So we installed Jdk 7u13 (1.7 Update 13) That cleared up that problem. Now i am stuck I believe my ports aren't open, as he cannot connect, through the Specified host in no-ip, But i still can... I've tried everything from port forwarding... to firewall inbound/outbound exceptions & refreshing no-ip... but nothing has come of it.
I've been trying to work this out all day... And i was highly determined when i set out. But 4 hours later. I come and ask the community, because i cant find any logical solution around this.
Thankyou in advance. Any solution will be a godsend :) Keep smiling! :D
i succesfully hosted a 508 on an internet dongle... mobile boradadbnadm so my biggest guess is that my port fowarding is the issue
[u][b]This issue is now fixed, I allowed port 443 through and this fixed my problem, I have also now moved to a 728.[/b][/u]

item.title: Problems With 508 Client not connecting to Update Server
item.dc:creator: @warouxriot warouxriot
item.description:
@warouxriot wrote:

Okay, Well I’ve had a few issues whilst trying to setup a 508, to make it public. The first problem i had was i couldn’t connect to my host no-ip, on my client. It had previously only connected to the local host of (192.168.1.2(or)127.0.0.1(or)0.0.0.0). Now i have finally fixed that, so it now connects through the host i had specified on my no-ip account. Then i uploaded the client for a friend to try, so i could see if my ports were open. He received; Java not recognized Error. So we installed Jdk 7u13 (1.7 Update 13) That cleared up that problem. Now i am stuck I believe my ports aren’t open, as he cannot connect, through the Specified host in no-ip, But i still can… I’ve tried everything from port forwarding… to firewall inbound/outbound exceptions & refreshing no-ip… but nothing has come of it.

I’ve been trying to work this out all day… And i was highly determined when i set out. But 4 hours later. I come and ask the community, because i cant find any logical solution around this.

Thankyou in advance. Any solution will be a godsend Keep smiling!

i succesfully hosted a 508 on an internet dongle… mobile boradadbnadm so my biggest guess is that my port fowarding is the issue

This issue is now fixed, I allowed port 443 through and this fixed my problem, I have also now moved to a 728.
